trans-unit.source: Provides a pool of threads that can be used to execute tasks, post work items, process asynchronous I/O, wait on behalf of other threads, and process timers.
trans-unit.target: 提供一个用于执行任务、 发送工作项、 处理异步 I/O、 代表其他线程等待和处理计时器的线程池。

trans-unit.source: Many applications create threads that spend a great deal of time in the sleeping state, waiting for an event to occur.
trans-unit.target: 许多应用程序创建花费大量时间处于睡眠状态，等待事件发生的线程。

trans-unit.source: Other threads might enter a sleeping state only to be awakened periodically to poll for a change or update status information.
trans-unit.target: 其他线程可能会进入休眠状态，只是为了被唤醒，定期轮询更改或更新状态信息。

trans-unit.source: The thread pool enables you to use threads more efficiently by providing your application with a pool of worker threads that are managed by the system.
trans-unit.target: 线程池，可通过提供一个受系统管理的辅助线程池上的应用程序更有效地使用线程。

trans-unit.source: Examples of operations that use thread pool threads include the following: - When you create a <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> or <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> object to perform some task asynchronously, by default the task is scheduled to run on a thread pool thread.
trans-unit.target: 使用线程池线程的操作示例包括以下:-当你创建<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>或<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601>对象来执行某些任务以异步方式，默认情况下，计划任务在线程池线程上运行。</xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> </xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>

trans-unit.source: - Asynchronous timers use the thread pool.
trans-unit.target: -异步计时器使用线程池。

trans-unit.source: Thread pool threads execute callbacks from the <xref:System.Threading.Timer?displayProperty=fullName> class and raise events from the <xref:System.Timers.Timer?displayProperty=fullName> class.
trans-unit.target: 线程池线程执行回调从<xref:System.Threading.Timer?displayProperty=fullName>从<xref:System.Timers.Timer?displayProperty=fullName>类</xref:System.Timers.Timer?displayProperty=fullName>的类和引发事件</xref:System.Threading.Timer?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - When you use registered wait handles, a system thread monitors the status of the wait handles.
trans-unit.target: -当你使用已注册的等待句柄，某个系统线程监视等待句柄的状态。

trans-unit.source: When a wait operation completes, a worker thread from the thread pool executes the corresponding callback function.
trans-unit.target: 等待操作完成后，从线程池工作线程将执行对应的回调函数。

trans-unit.source: - When you call the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem%2A> method to queue a method for execution on a thread pool thread.
trans-unit.target: -当你调用<xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem%2A>方法进行排队以在线程池线程上执行的方法。</xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: You do this by passing the method a <xref:System.Threading.WaitCallback> delegate.
trans-unit.target: 通过传递给该方法执行此操作<xref:System.Threading.WaitCallback>委派。</xref:System.Threading.WaitCallback>

trans-unit.source: The delegate has the signature <CodeContentPlaceHolder>0</CodeContentPlaceHolder> <CodeContentPlaceHolder>1</CodeContentPlaceHolder> where `state` is an object that contains data to be used by the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 委托具有签名<CodeContentPlaceHolder>0</CodeContentPlaceHolder><CodeContentPlaceHolder>1</CodeContentPlaceHolder>其中`state`是一个对象，包含由委托使用的数据。

trans-unit.source: The actual data can be passed to the delegate by calling the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem%28System.Threading.WaitCallback%2CSystem.Object%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 实际的数据可以通过调用传递给委托<xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem%28System.Threading.WaitCallback%2CSystem.Object%29>方法。</xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem%28System.Threading.WaitCallback%2CSystem.Object%29>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The threads in the managed thread pool are background threads.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 在托管的线程池线程是后台线程。

trans-unit.source: That is, their <xref:System.Threading.Thread.IsBackground%2A> properties are `true`.
trans-unit.target: 即，其<xref:System.Threading.Thread.IsBackground%2A>属性`true`。</xref:System.Threading.Thread.IsBackground%2A>

trans-unit.source: This means that a ThreadPool thread will not keep an application running after all foreground threads have exited.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着线程池线程不会对所有前台线程均都退出之后运行的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > When the thread pool reuses a thread, it does not clear the data in thread local storage or in fields that are marked with the <xref:System.ThreadStaticAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!IMPORTANT]&1;> 时线程池重用某个线程，它不会清除在线程本地存储或使用标记的字段中的数据<xref:System.ThreadStaticAttribute>属性。</xref:System.ThreadStaticAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when a method examines thread local storage or fields that are marked with the <xref:System.ThreadStaticAttribute> attribute, the values it finds might be left over from an earlier use of the thread pool thread.
trans-unit.target: 因此，检查线程本地存储区或的字段的方法标记有<xref:System.ThreadStaticAttribute>属性，它找到的值可能会留下线程池线程更早版本使用过程中。</xref:System.ThreadStaticAttribute>

trans-unit.source: You can also queue work items that are not related to a wait operation to the thread pool.
trans-unit.target: 你可以排队到线程池等待操作不相关的工作项。

trans-unit.source: To request that a work item be handled by a thread in the thread pool, call the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要请求的工作项来处理线程池中线程，调用<xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem%2A>方法。</xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method takes as a parameter a reference to the method or delegate that will be called by the thread selected from the thread pool.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将对该方法或将由所选线程池中的线程调用的委托的引用作为参数。

trans-unit.source: There is no way to cancel a work item after it has been queued.
trans-unit.target: 没有方法来取消工作项之后它已在排队等候。

trans-unit.source: Timer-queue timers and registered wait operations also use the thread pool.
trans-unit.target: 计时器队列中的计时器和已注册的等待操作也使用线程池。

trans-unit.source: Their callback functions are queued to the thread pool.
trans-unit.target: 它们的回调函数要排队发送至线程池。

trans-unit.source: There is one thread pool per process.
trans-unit.target: 没有每个进程的一个线程池。

trans-unit.source: Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/add/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the default size of the thread pool for a process depends on several factors, such as the size of the virtual address space.
trans-unit.target: 开头[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/add/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，线程池的进程的默认大小取决于若干因素，例如虚拟地址空间的大小。

trans-unit.source: A process can call the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.GetMaxThreads%2A> method to determine the number of threads.
trans-unit.target: 进程可以调用<xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.GetMaxThreads%2A>方法，以确定线程数。</xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.GetMaxThreads%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of threads in the thread pool can be changed by using the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.SetMaxThreads%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用更改线程池中的线程数<xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.SetMaxThreads%2A>方法。</xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.SetMaxThreads%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each thread uses the default stack size and runs at the default priority.
trans-unit.target: 每个线程使用的默认堆栈大小，并运行默认优先级。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Unmanaged code that hosts the .NET Framework can change the size of the thread pool by using the `CorSetMaxThreads` function, defined in the mscoree.h file.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 承载.NET Framework 的非托管的代码可以更改通过使用线程池的大小`CorSetMaxThreads`mscoree.h 文件中定义的函数。

trans-unit.source: The thread pool provides new worker threads or I/O completion threads on demand until it reaches the minimum for each category.
trans-unit.target: 线程池按需提供新的辅助线程或 I/O 完成线程直到它达到每个类别的最低要求。

trans-unit.source: When a minimum is reached, the thread pool can create additional threads in that category or wait until some tasks complete.
trans-unit.target: 当达到最小值时，线程池可以在该类别中创建其他线程或等待，直到一些任务完成。

trans-unit.source: Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/add/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], the thread pool creates and destroys worker threads in order to optimize throughput, which is defined as the number of tasks that complete per unit of time.
trans-unit.target: 开头[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/add/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]，线程池创建和销毁工作线程以优化吞吐量，吞吐量被定义为每个单位时间完成的任务数。

trans-unit.source: Too few threads might not make optimal use of available resources, whereas too many threads could increase resource contention.
trans-unit.target: 线程过少不可能实现可用资源的最优利用，而线程过多则可能增加资源争用。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When demand is low, the actual number of thread pool threads can fall below the minimum values.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 时需求较低，线程池线程的实际数量可以低于最小值。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.GetMinThreads%2A> method to obtain these minimum values.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.GetMinThreads%2A>方法来获取这些最小值。</xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.GetMinThreads%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > You can use the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.SetMinThreads%2A> method to increase the minimum number of threads.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!CAUTION]&1;> 可以使用<xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.SetMinThreads%2A>方法来增加最小线程数。</xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.SetMinThreads%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, unnecessarily increasing these values can cause performance problems.
trans-unit.target: 但是，不必要地增加这些值可能导致性能问题。

trans-unit.source: If too many tasks start at the same time, all of them might appear to be slow.
trans-unit.target: 如果在同一时间开始太多的任务，所有这些可能会很慢。

trans-unit.source: In most cases the thread pool will perform better with its own algorithm for allocating threads.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下线程池将使用其自己的分配线程算法更好地执行。

trans-unit.source: Binds an operating system handle to the <xref href="System.Threading.ThreadPool"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 将绑定到的操作系统句柄<xref href="System.Threading.ThreadPool"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IntPtr> that holds the handle.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IntPtr>持有句柄。</xref:System.IntPtr>

trans-unit.source: The handle must have been opened for overlapped I/O on the unmanaged side.
trans-unit.target: 必须已为非托管端重叠 I/O 打开了句柄。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the handle is bound; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果句柄绑定;，否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 调用方没有所要求的权限。

trans-unit.source: Binds an operating system handle to the <xref href="System.Threading.ThreadPool"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 将绑定到的操作系统句柄<xref href="System.Threading.ThreadPool"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The `osHandle` parameter should be a <xref:Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeFileHandle>, which derives from the abstract <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.SafeHandle> class.
trans-unit.target: `osHandle`参数应该是的<xref:Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeFileHandle>，其派生自抽象<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.SafeHandle>类。</xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.SafeHandle> </xref:Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeFileHandle>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.SafeHandle> that holds the operating system handle.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.SafeHandle>保存操作系统句柄。</xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.SafeHandle>

trans-unit.source: The handle must have been opened for overlapped I/O on the unmanaged side.
trans-unit.target: 必须已为非托管端重叠 I/O 打开了句柄。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the handle is bound; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果句柄绑定;，否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: osHandle is .
trans-unit.target: osHandleis .

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the difference between the maximum number of thread pool threads returned by the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.GetMaxThreads*> method, and the number currently active.
trans-unit.target: 检索的最大返回的线程池线程数之间的差异<xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.GetMaxThreads*>方法，并且当前处于活动状态的数量。</xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.GetMaxThreads*>

trans-unit.source: When GetAvailableThreads returns, the variable specified by `workerThreads` contains the number of additional worker threads that can be started, and the variable specified by `completionPortThreads` contains the number of additional asynchronous I/O threads that can be started.
trans-unit.target: 当 GetAvailableThreads 返回时，指定的变量`workerThreads`包含可以启动的其他工作线程和指定的变量的数量`completionPortThreads`包含可以启动的其他异步 I/O 线程数。

trans-unit.source: If there are no available threads, additional thread pool requests remain queued until thread pool threads become available.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有可用的线程，其他线程池请求保持排队状态，直到线程池线程变为可用。

trans-unit.source: The number of available worker threads.
trans-unit.target: 可用的工作线程数。

trans-unit.source: The number of available asynchronous I/O threads.
trans-unit.target: 可用异步 I/O 线程数。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the number of requests to the thread pool that can be active concurrently.
trans-unit.target: 检索可以同时处于活动状态的线程池的请求数。

trans-unit.source: All requests above that number remain queued until thread pool threads become available.
trans-unit.target: 大于此数目的所有请求将都保持排队，直到线程池线程变为可用。

trans-unit.source: When GetMaxThreads returns, the variable specified by `workerThreads` contains the maximum number of worker threads allowed in the thread pool, and the variable specified by `completionPortThreads` contains the maximum number of asynchronous I/O threads allowed in the thread pool.
trans-unit.target: 当 GetMaxThreads 返回时，指定的变量`workerThreads`包含在线程池中允许的工作线程和指定的变量的最大数目`completionPortThreads`包含在线程池中允许的异步 I/O 线程的最大数目。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.GetAvailableThreads%2A> method to determine the actual number of threads in the thread pool at any given time.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.GetAvailableThreads%2A>方法来确定在任何给定时间在线程池中的线程的实际数量。</xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.GetAvailableThreads%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.SetMaxThreads%2A> to set the maximum number of worker threads and asynchronous I/O threads in the thread pool.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.SetMaxThreads%2A>在线程池中设置的最大工作线程和异步 I/O 线程数。</xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.SetMaxThreads%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can queue as many thread pool requests as system memory allows.
trans-unit.target: 你可以排队尽可能的系统内存允许线程池请求。

trans-unit.source: If there are more requests than thread pool threads, the additional requests remain queued until thread pool threads become available.
trans-unit.target: 如果有更多的请求数多于线程池线程数，则其他请求保持排队状态，直到线程池线程变为可用。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of worker threads in the thread pool.
trans-unit.target: 最大线程池中辅助线程数。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of asynchronous I/O threads in the thread pool.
trans-unit.target: 最大线程池中异步 I/O 线程数。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the minimum number of threads the thread pool creates on demand, as new requests are made, before switching to an algorithm for managing thread creation and destruction.
trans-unit.target: 进行新的请求时，在切换到管理线程创建和销毁的算法之前检索的最小线程池根据需要，创建的线程数。

trans-unit.source: The thread pool provides new worker threads or I/O completion threads on demand until it reaches the minimum for each category.
trans-unit.target: 线程池按需提供新的辅助线程或 I/O 完成线程直到它达到每个类别的最低要求。

trans-unit.source: By default, the minimum number of threads is set to the number of processors on a system.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，最小线程数设置为在系统上的处理器数。

trans-unit.source: When the minimum is reached, the thread pool can create additional threads in that category or wait until some tasks complete.
trans-unit.target: 当达到最小值时，线程池可以在该类别中创建其他线程或等待，直到一些任务完成。

trans-unit.source: Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/add/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], the thread pool creates and destroys threads in order to optimize throughput, which is defined as the number of tasks that complete per unit of time.
trans-unit.target: 开头[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/add/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]，线程池创建和销毁线程以优化吞吐量，吞吐量被定义为每个单位时间完成的任务数。

trans-unit.source: Too few threads might not make optimal use of available resources, whereas too many threads could increase resource contention.
trans-unit.target: 线程过少不可能实现可用资源的最优利用，而线程过多则可能增加资源争用。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When demand is low, the actual number of thread pool threads can fall below the minimum values.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 时需求较低，线程池线程的实际数量可以低于最小值。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains the minimum number of worker threads that the thread pool creates on demand.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回时，包含的最小线程池根据需要创建的工作线程数。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains the minimum number of asynchronous I/O threads that the thread pool creates on demand.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回时，包含的最小线程池根据需要创建的异步 I/O 线程数。

trans-unit.source: Queues a method for execution.
trans-unit.target: 方法排入队列以便执行。

trans-unit.source: The method executes when a thread pool thread becomes available.
trans-unit.target: 方法在线程池线程变得可用时执行。

trans-unit.source: You can place data required by the queued method in the instance fields of the class in which the method is defined, or you can use the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem%28System.Threading.WaitCallback%2CSystem.Object%29> overload that accepts an object containing the necessary data.
trans-unit.target: 您可以将数据排队方法的类定义方法，或可以使用的实例字段中所需的放置<xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem%28System.Threading.WaitCallback%2CSystem.Object%29>重载接受一个包含所需数据的对象。</xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem%28System.Threading.WaitCallback%2CSystem.Object%29>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Visual Basic users can omit the <xref:System.Threading.WaitCallback> constructor, and simply use the `AddressOf` operator when passing the callback method to <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> Visual Basic 用户可以省略<xref:System.Threading.WaitCallback>构造函数，并且只需使用`AddressOf`运算符时将回调方法传递给<xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem%2A>.</xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem%2A> </xref:System.Threading.WaitCallback>

trans-unit.source: Visual Basic automatically calls the correct delegate constructor.
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic 会自动调用正确的委托构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Version Information In the .NET Framework version 2.0, the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property value is propagated to worker threads queued using the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 版本信息在.NET Framework 2.0 版中，<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性值将传播到辅助线程排队使用<xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem%2A>方法。</xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem%2A> </xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In earlier versions, the principal information is not propagated.
trans-unit.target: 在早期版本，不会传播的主体的信息。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Threading.WaitCallback"></xref> that represents the method to be executed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Threading.WaitCallback"> </xref> ，表示要执行的方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the method is successfully queued; <xref:System.NotSupportedException> is thrown if the work item could not be queued.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此方法成功排队;<xref:System.NotSupportedException>无法排队的工作项时引发。</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: callBack is .
trans-unit.target: callBackis .

trans-unit.source: The common language runtime (CLR) is hosted, and the host does not support this action.
trans-unit.target: 承载公共语言运行时 (CLR)，和主机不支持此操作。

trans-unit.source: Queues a method for execution, and specifies an object containing data to be used by the method.
trans-unit.target: 方法排入队列的执行，并指定包含要方法要使用的数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: The method executes when a thread pool thread becomes available.
trans-unit.target: 方法在线程池线程变得可用时执行。

trans-unit.source: If the callback method requires complex data, you can define a class to contain the data.
trans-unit.target: 如果回调方法需要复杂的数据，你可以定义一个类来包含的数据。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Visual Basic users can omit the <xref:System.Threading.WaitCallback> constructor, and simply use the `AddressOf` operator when passing the callback method to QueueUserWorkItem.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> Visual Basic 用户可以省略<xref:System.Threading.WaitCallback>构造函数，并且只需使用`AddressOf`运算符时将回调方法传递到 QueueUserWorkItem。</xref:System.Threading.WaitCallback>

trans-unit.source: Visual Basic automatically calls the correct delegate constructor.
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic 会自动调用正确的委托构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Version Information In the .NET Framework version 2.0, the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property value is propagated to worker threads queued using the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 版本信息在.NET Framework 2.0 版中，<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性值将传播到辅助线程排队使用<xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem%2A>方法。</xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem%2A> </xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In earlier versions, the principal information is not propagated.
trans-unit.target: 在早期版本，不会传播的主体的信息。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Threading.WaitCallback"></xref> representing the method to execute.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Threading.WaitCallback"> </xref>表示要执行的方法。

trans-unit.source: An object containing data to be used by the method.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含数据的方法要使用的对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the method is successfully queued; <xref:System.NotSupportedException> is thrown if the work item could not be queued.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此方法成功排队;<xref:System.NotSupportedException>无法排队的工作项时引发。</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: The common language runtime (CLR) is hosted, and the host does not support this action.
trans-unit.target: 承载公共语言运行时 (CLR)，和主机不支持此操作。

trans-unit.source: callBack is .
trans-unit.target: callBackis .

trans-unit.source: Registers a delegate to wait for a <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>, specifying a 32-bit signed integer for the time-out in milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 注册委托以等待<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>，以毫秒为单位指定超时 32 位有符号的整数。</xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>

trans-unit.source: When you are finished using the <xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle> that is returned by this method, call its <xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to release references to the wait handle.
trans-unit.target: 完成之后使用<xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle>此方法返回时，请调用其<xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法来释放对等待句柄的引用。</xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle>

trans-unit.source: We recommend that you always call the <xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, even if you specify `true` for `executeOnlyOnce`.
trans-unit.target: 我们建议你始终调用<xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法，即使你指定`true`为`executeOnlyOnce`。</xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Garbage collection works more efficiently if you call the <xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method instead of depending on the registered wait handle's finalizer.
trans-unit.target: 垃圾回收的工作的详细信息有效地如果调用<xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法而不是具体取决于已注册的等待句柄的终结器。</xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The RegisterWaitForSingleObject method queues the specified delegate to the thread pool.
trans-unit.target: RegisterWaitForSingleObject 方法指定的委托排队到线程池。

trans-unit.source: A worker thread will execute the delegate when one of the following occurs: - The specified object is in the signaled state.
trans-unit.target: 在下列情况之一发生时，工作线程将执行委托:-指定的对象处于终止状态。

trans-unit.source: - The time-out interval elapses.
trans-unit.target: -超时间隔已过期。

trans-unit.source: The RegisterWaitForSingleObject method checks the current state of the specified object's <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>.
trans-unit.target: RegisterWaitForSingleObject 方法检查指定对象的<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>.</xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>的当前状态

trans-unit.source: If the object's state is unsignaled, the method registers a wait operation.
trans-unit.target: 如果对象的状态为非终止状态，该方法将注册一个等待操作。

trans-unit.source: The wait operation is performed by a thread from the thread pool.
trans-unit.target: 等待操作由线程池中的线程执行。

trans-unit.source: The delegate is executed by a worker thread when the object's state becomes signaled or the time-out interval elapses.
trans-unit.target: 对象的状态将被发送信号或超时间隔结束时，将通过工作线程执行委托。

trans-unit.source: If the `timeOutInterval` parameter is not 0 (zero) and the `executeOnlyOnce` parameter is `false`, the timer is reset every time the event is signaled or the time-out interval elapses.
trans-unit.target: 如果`timeOutInterval`参数不是 0 （零） 和`executeOnlyOnce`参数是`false`，每次该事件处于有信号状态或达到超时间隔重置计时器。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Using a <xref:System.Threading.Mutex> for `waitObject` does not provide mutual exclusion for the callbacks because the underlying Win32 API uses the default `WT_EXECUTEDEFAULT` flag, so each callback is dispatched on a separate thread pool thread.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!IMPORTANT]&1;> 使用<xref:System.Threading.Mutex>为`waitObject`不提供的回调的互相排斥，因为基础的 Win32 API 使用默认值`WT_EXECUTEDEFAULT`标志，以便在一个单独的线程池线程上调度每个回调。</xref:System.Threading.Mutex>

trans-unit.source: Instead of a <xref:System.Threading.Mutex>, use a <xref:System.Threading.Semaphore> with a maximum count of 1.
trans-unit.target: 而不是<xref:System.Threading.Mutex>，使用<xref:System.Threading.Semaphore>与的最大计数为 1。</xref:System.Threading.Semaphore> </xref:System.Threading.Mutex>

trans-unit.source: To cancel the wait operation, call the <xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消等待操作，请调用<xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The wait thread uses the Win32 `WaitForMultipleObjects` function to monitor registered wait operations.
trans-unit.target: 等待线程使用 Win32`WaitForMultipleObjects`函数来监视已注册的等待操作。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, if you must use the same native operating system handle in multiple calls to RegisterWaitForSingleObject, you must duplicate the handle using the Win32 `DuplicateHandle` function.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果多个调用 RegisterWaitForSingleObject，必须使用相同的本机操作系统句柄，你必须在使用 Win32 句柄`DuplicateHandle`函数。

trans-unit.source: Note that you should not pulse an event object passed to RegisterWaitForSingleObject, because the wait thread might not detect that the event is signaled before it is reset.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，不应传递到 RegisterWaitForSingleObject，因为等待线程可能检测不到该事件已终止之前将重置。

trans-unit.source: Before returning, the function modifies the state of some types of synchronization objects.
trans-unit.target: 再返回，该函数修改修改某些类型的同步对象的状态。

trans-unit.source: Modification occurs only for the object whose signaled state caused the wait condition to be satisfied.
trans-unit.target: 修改仅发生在其终止的状态导致等待条件得到满足的对象。

trans-unit.source: For example, the count of a semaphore is decreased by one.
trans-unit.target: 例如，信号量的计数减少&1;。

trans-unit.source: Version Information Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property value is propagated to worker threads queued using the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 版本信息与.NET Framework 2.0 版中，正在启动<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性值将传播到辅助线程排队使用<xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject%2A>方法。</xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject%2A> </xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In earlier versions, the principal information is not propagated.
trans-unit.target: 在早期版本，不会传播的主体的信息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle> to register.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>注册。</xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>

trans-unit.source: Use a <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle> other than <xref:System.Threading.Mutex>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>以外<xref:System.Threading.Mutex>.</xref:System.Threading.Mutex> </xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Threading.WaitOrTimerCallback"></xref> delegate to call when the `waitObject` parameter is signaled.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Threading.WaitOrTimerCallback"> </xref>时调用的委托`waitObject`参数发出信号。

trans-unit.source: The object that is passed to the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 传递给委托的对象。

trans-unit.source: The time-out in milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 以毫秒为单位的超时。

trans-unit.source: If the `millisecondsTimeOutInterval` parameter is 0 (zero), the function tests the object's state and returns immediately.
trans-unit.target: 如果`millisecondsTimeOutInterval`参数为 0 （零），函数将测试对象的状态并立即返回。

trans-unit.source: If `millisecondsTimeOutInterval` is -1, the function's time-out interval never elapses.
trans-unit.target: 如果`millisecondsTimeOutInterval`为-1，函数的超时间隔永远不过期。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the thread will no longer wait on the `waitObject` parameter after the delegate has been called; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to indicate that the timer is reset every time the wait operation completes until the wait is unregistered.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要指示该线程将不再等待`waitObject`参数后已调用的委托;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>以指示每次等待操作完成取消注册在等待之前都重置计时器。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle"></xref> that encapsulates the native handle.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle"> </xref>封装本机句柄。

trans-unit.source: The millisecondsTimeOutInterval parameter is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: millisecondsTimeOutInterval 参数是小于-1。

trans-unit.source: Registers a delegate to wait for a <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>, specifying a 64-bit signed integer for the time-out in milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 注册委托以等待<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>，以毫秒为单位指定超时 64 位有符号的整数。</xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>

trans-unit.source: When you are finished using the <xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle> that is returned by this method, call its <xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to release references to the wait handle.
trans-unit.target: 完成之后使用<xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle>此方法返回时，请调用其<xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法来释放对等待句柄的引用。</xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle>

trans-unit.source: We recommend that you always call the <xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, even if you specify `true` for `executeOnlyOnce`.
trans-unit.target: 我们建议你始终调用<xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法，即使你指定`true`为`executeOnlyOnce`。</xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Garbage collection works more efficiently if you call the <xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method instead of depending on the registered wait handle's finalizer.
trans-unit.target: 垃圾回收的工作的详细信息有效地如果调用<xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法而不是具体取决于已注册的等待句柄的终结器。</xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.target: 如果对象的状态为非终止状态，该方法将注册一个等待操作。

trans-unit.source: The wait operation is performed by a thread from the thread pool.
trans-unit.target: 等待操作由线程池中的线程执行。

trans-unit.source: The delegate is executed by a worker thread when the object's state becomes signaled or the time-out interval elapses.
trans-unit.target: 对象的状态将被发送信号或超时间隔结束时，将通过工作线程执行委托。

trans-unit.source: If the `timeOutInterval` parameter is not 0 (zero) and the `executeOnlyOnce` parameter is `false`, the timer is reset every time the event is signaled or the time-out interval elapses.
trans-unit.target: 如果`timeOutInterval`参数不是 0 （零） 和`executeOnlyOnce`参数是`false`，每次该事件处于有信号状态或达到超时间隔重置计时器。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Using a <xref:System.Threading.Mutex> for `waitObject` does not provide mutual exclusion for the callbacks because the underlying Win32 API uses the default `WT_EXECUTEDEFAULT` flag, so each callback is dispatched on a separate thread pool thread.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!IMPORTANT]&1;> 使用<xref:System.Threading.Mutex>为`waitObject`不提供的回调的互相排斥，因为基础的 Win32 API 使用默认值`WT_EXECUTEDEFAULT`标志，以便在一个单独的线程池线程上调度每个回调。</xref:System.Threading.Mutex>

trans-unit.source: Instead of a <xref:System.Threading.Mutex>, use a <xref:System.Threading.Semaphore> with a maximum count of 1.
trans-unit.target: 而不是<xref:System.Threading.Mutex>，使用<xref:System.Threading.Semaphore>与的最大计数为 1。</xref:System.Threading.Semaphore> </xref:System.Threading.Mutex>

trans-unit.source: To cancel the wait operation, call the <xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消等待操作，请调用<xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The wait thread uses the Win32 `WaitForMultipleObjects` function to monitor registered wait operations.
trans-unit.target: 等待线程使用 Win32`WaitForMultipleObjects`函数来监视已注册的等待操作。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, if you must use the same native operating system handle in multiple calls to RegisterWaitForSingleObject, you must duplicate the handle using the Win32 `DuplicateHandle` function.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果多个调用 RegisterWaitForSingleObject，必须使用相同的本机操作系统句柄，你必须在使用 Win32 句柄`DuplicateHandle`函数。

trans-unit.source: Note that you should not pulse an event object passed to RegisterWaitForSingleObject, because the wait thread might not detect that the event is signaled before it is reset.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，不应传递到 RegisterWaitForSingleObject，因为等待线程可能检测不到该事件已终止之前将重置。

trans-unit.source: Before returning, the function modifies the state of some types of synchronization objects.
trans-unit.target: 再返回，该函数修改修改某些类型的同步对象的状态。

trans-unit.source: Modification occurs only for the object whose signaled state caused the wait condition to be satisfied.
trans-unit.target: 修改仅发生在其终止的状态导致等待条件得到满足的对象。

trans-unit.source: For example, the count of a semaphore is decreased by one.
trans-unit.target: 例如，信号量的计数减少&1;。

trans-unit.source: Version Information Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property value is propagated to worker threads queued using the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 版本信息与.NET Framework 2.0 版中，正在启动<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性值将传播到辅助线程排队使用<xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject%2A>方法。</xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject%2A> </xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In earlier versions, the principal information is not propagated.
trans-unit.target: 在早期版本，不会传播的主体的信息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle> to register.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>注册。</xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>

trans-unit.source: Use a <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle> other than <xref:System.Threading.Mutex>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>以外<xref:System.Threading.Mutex>.</xref:System.Threading.Mutex> </xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Threading.WaitOrTimerCallback"></xref> delegate to call when the `waitObject` parameter is signaled.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Threading.WaitOrTimerCallback"> </xref>时调用的委托`waitObject`参数发出信号。

trans-unit.source: The object passed to the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 将对象传递给委托。

trans-unit.source: The time-out represented by a <xref:System.TimeSpan>.
trans-unit.target: 一种<xref:System.TimeSpan>。</xref:System.TimeSpan>所表示的超时时间

trans-unit.source: If `timeout` is 0 (zero), the function tests the object's state and returns immediately.
trans-unit.target: 如果`timeout`为 0 （零），函数将测试对象的状态并立即返回。

trans-unit.source: If `timeout` is -1, the function's time-out interval never elapses.
trans-unit.target: 如果`timeout`为-1，函数的超时间隔永远不过期。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the thread will no longer wait on the `waitObject` parameter after the delegate has been called; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to indicate that the timer is reset every time the wait operation completes until the wait is unregistered.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要指示该线程将不再等待`waitObject`参数后已调用的委托;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>以指示每次等待操作完成取消注册在等待之前都重置计时器。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle"></xref> that encapsulates the native handle.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle"> </xref>封装本机句柄。

trans-unit.source: The timeout parameter is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: timeout 参数是小于-1。

trans-unit.source: The timeout parameter is greater than <xref:System.Int32.MaxValue?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: timeout 参数大于<xref:System.Int32.MaxValue?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Registers a delegate to wait for a <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>, specifying a 32-bit unsigned integer for the time-out in milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 注册委托以等待<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>，以毫秒为单位指定超时的 32 位无符号的整数。</xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>

trans-unit.source: When you are finished using the <xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle> that is returned by this method, call its <xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to release references to the wait handle.
trans-unit.target: 完成之后使用<xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle>此方法返回时，请调用其<xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法来释放对等待句柄的引用。</xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle>

trans-unit.source: We recommend that you always call the <xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, even if you specify `true` for `executeOnlyOnce`.
trans-unit.target: 我们建议你始终调用<xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法，即使你指定`true`为`executeOnlyOnce`。</xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Garbage collection works more efficiently if you call the <xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method instead of depending on the registered wait handle's finalizer.
trans-unit.target: 垃圾回收的工作的详细信息有效地如果调用<xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法而不是具体取决于已注册的等待句柄的终结器。</xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject%2A> method queues the specified delegate to the thread pool.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject%2A>方法指定的委托排队到线程池。</xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: A worker thread will execute the delegate when one of the following occurs: - The specified object is in the signaled state.
trans-unit.target: 在下列情况之一发生时，工作线程将执行委托:-指定的对象处于终止状态。

trans-unit.source: - The time-out interval elapses.
trans-unit.target: -超时间隔已过期。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject%2A>method checks the current state of the specified object's <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject%2A>方法检查指定对象的<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>.</xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>的当前状态</xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the object's state is unsignaled, the method registers a wait operation.
trans-unit.target: 如果对象的状态为非终止状态，该方法将注册一个等待操作。

trans-unit.source: The wait operation is performed by a thread from the thread pool.
trans-unit.target: 等待操作由线程池中的线程执行。

trans-unit.source: The delegate is executed by a worker thread when the object's state becomes signaled or the time-out interval elapses.
trans-unit.target: 对象的状态将被发送信号或超时间隔结束时，将通过工作线程执行委托。

trans-unit.source: If the `timeOutInterval` parameter is not 0 (zero) and the `executeOnlyOnce` parameter is `false`, the timer is reset every time the event is signaled or the time-out interval elapses.
trans-unit.target: 如果`timeOutInterval`参数不是 0 （零） 和`executeOnlyOnce`参数是`false`，每次该事件处于有信号状态或达到超时间隔重置计时器。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Using a <xref:System.Threading.Mutex> for `waitObject` does not provide mutual exclusion for the callbacks because the underlying Win32 API uses the default `WT_EXECUTEDEFAULT` flag, so each callback is dispatched on a separate thread pool thread.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!IMPORTANT]&1;> 使用<xref:System.Threading.Mutex>为`waitObject`不提供的回调的互相排斥，因为基础的 Win32 API 使用默认值`WT_EXECUTEDEFAULT`标志，以便在一个单独的线程池线程上调度每个回调。</xref:System.Threading.Mutex>

trans-unit.source: Instead of a <xref:System.Threading.Mutex>, use a <xref:System.Threading.Semaphore> with a maximum count of 1.

trans-unit.source: To cancel the wait operation, call the <xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消等待操作，请调用<xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The wait thread uses the Win32 `WaitForMultipleObjects` function to monitor registered wait operations.
trans-unit.target: 等待线程使用 Win32`WaitForMultipleObjects`函数来监视已注册的等待操作。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, if you must use the same native operating system handle in multiple calls to <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject%2A>, you must duplicate the handle using the Win32 `DuplicateHandle` function.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果必须使用相同的本机操作系统句柄中多次调用<xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject%2A>，你必须使用 Win32 句柄复制`DuplicateHandle`函数。</xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that you should not pulse an event object passed to <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject%2A>, because the wait thread might not detect that the event is signaled before it is reset.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，不应传递到<xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject%2A>，因为等待线程可能检测不到该事件已终止之前将重置。</xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: Before returning, the function modifies the state of some types of synchronization objects.
trans-unit.target: 再返回，该函数修改修改某些类型的同步对象的状态。

trans-unit.source: Modification occurs only for the object whose signaled state caused the wait condition to be satisfied.
trans-unit.target: 修改仅发生在其终止的状态导致等待条件得到满足的对象。

trans-unit.source: For example, the count of a semaphore is decreased by one.
trans-unit.target: 例如，信号量的计数减少&1;。

trans-unit.source: Version Information Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property value is propagated to worker threads queued using the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 版本信息与.NET Framework 2.0 版中，正在启动<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性值将传播到辅助线程排队使用<xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject%2A>方法。</xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject%2A> </xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In earlier versions, the principal information is not propagated.
trans-unit.target: 在早期版本，不会传播的主体的信息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle> to register.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>注册。</xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>

trans-unit.source: Use a <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle> other than <xref:System.Threading.Mutex>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>以外<xref:System.Threading.Mutex>.</xref:System.Threading.Mutex> </xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Threading.WaitOrTimerCallback"></xref> delegate to call when the `waitObject` parameter is signaled.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Threading.WaitOrTimerCallback"> </xref>时调用的委托`waitObject`参数发出信号。

trans-unit.source: The object passed to the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 将对象传递给委托。

trans-unit.source: The time-out in milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 以毫秒为单位的超时。

trans-unit.source: If the `millisecondsTimeOutInterval` parameter is 0 (zero), the function tests the object's state and returns immediately.
trans-unit.target: 如果`millisecondsTimeOutInterval`参数为 0 （零），函数将测试对象的状态并立即返回。

trans-unit.source: If `millisecondsTimeOutInterval` is -1, the function's time-out interval never elapses.
trans-unit.target: 如果`millisecondsTimeOutInterval`为-1，函数的超时间隔永远不过期。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the thread will no longer wait on the `waitObject` parameter after the delegate has been called; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to indicate that the timer is reset every time the wait operation completes until the wait is unregistered.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要指示该线程将不再等待`waitObject`参数后已调用的委托;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>以指示每次等待操作完成取消注册在等待之前都重置计时器。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle"></xref> that can be used to cancel the registered wait operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle"> </xref>可以用于取消已注册的等待操作。

trans-unit.source: The millisecondsTimeOutInterval parameter is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: millisecondsTimeOutInterval 参数是小于-1。

trans-unit.source: Sets the number of requests to the thread pool that can be active concurrently.
trans-unit.target: 设置可以同时处于活动状态的线程池的请求数。

trans-unit.source: All requests above that number remain queued until thread pool threads become available.
trans-unit.target: 大于此数目的所有请求将都保持排队，直到线程池线程变为可用。

trans-unit.source: You cannot set the maximum number of worker threads or I/O completion threads to a number smaller than the number of processors on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 不能设置工作线程或 I/O 完成线程的最大数为一个数字小于的计算机上的处理器数。

trans-unit.source: To determine how many processors are present, retrieve the value of the <xref:System.Environment.ProcessorCount%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定存在多少处理器，检索的值<xref:System.Environment.ProcessorCount%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Environment.ProcessorCount%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In addition, you cannot set the maximum number of worker threads or I/O completion threads to a number smaller than the corresponding minimum number of worker threads or I/O completion threads.
trans-unit.target: 此外，你不能设置辅助线程或为一个小于最小相应工作线程数的数字的 I/O 完成线程或 I/O 完成线程的最大数目。

trans-unit.source: To determine the minimum thread pool size, call the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.GetMinThreads%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定最小线程池大小，请调用<xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.GetMinThreads%2A>方法。</xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.GetMinThreads%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the common language runtime is hosted, for example by Internet Information Services (IIS) or SQL Server, the host can limit or prevent changes to the thread pool size.
trans-unit.target: 如果承载公共语言运行时，例如通过 Internet 信息服务 (IIS) 或 SQL Server，主机可以限制或阻止更改到线程池大小。

trans-unit.source: Use caution when changing the maximum number of threads in the thread pool.
trans-unit.target: 更改的最大线程池中的线程数时要格外小心。

trans-unit.source: While your code might benefit, the changes might have an adverse effect on code libraries you use.
trans-unit.target: 虽然你的代码中获益，所做的更改可能产生负面影响上使用的代码库。

trans-unit.source: Setting the thread pool size too large can cause performance problems.
trans-unit.target: 设置线程池大小太大，则会导致性能问题。

trans-unit.source: If too many threads are executing at the same time, the task switching overhead becomes a significant factor.
trans-unit.target: 如果在同一时间执行过多的线程，任务切换开销就成为一个重要的因素。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of worker threads in the thread pool.
trans-unit.target: 最大线程池中辅助线程数。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of asynchronous I/O threads in the thread pool.
trans-unit.target: 最大线程池中异步 I/O 线程数。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the change is successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果更改成功，则否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Sets the minimum number of threads the thread pool creates on demand, as new requests are made, before switching to an algorithm for managing thread creation and destruction.
trans-unit.target: 进行新的请求时，在切换到管理线程创建和销毁的算法之前设置的最小线程池根据需要，创建的线程数。

trans-unit.source: The thread pool provides new worker threads or I/O completion threads on demand until it reaches the minimum for each category.
trans-unit.target: 线程池按需提供新的辅助线程或 I/O 完成线程直到它达到每个类别的最低要求。

trans-unit.source: When the minimum is reached, the thread pool can create additional threads in that category or wait until some tasks complete.
trans-unit.target: 当达到最小值时，线程池可以在该类别中创建其他线程或等待，直到一些任务完成。

trans-unit.source: Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/add/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], the thread pool creates and destroys threads in order to optimize throughput, which is defined as the number of tasks that complete per unit of time.
trans-unit.target: 开头[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/add/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]，线程池创建和销毁线程以优化吞吐量，吞吐量被定义为每个单位时间完成的任务数。

trans-unit.source: Too few threads might not make optimal use of available resources, whereas too many threads could increase resource contention.
trans-unit.target: 线程过少不可能实现可用资源的最优利用，而线程过多则可能增加资源争用。

trans-unit.source: When demand is low, the actual number of thread pool threads can fall below the minimum values.
trans-unit.target: 需求较低时，线程池线程的实际数量可以低于最小值。

trans-unit.source: If you specify a negative number or a number larger than the maximum number of active thread pool threads (obtained using <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.GetMaxThreads%2A>), SetMinThreads returns `false` and does not change either of the minimum values.
trans-unit.target: 如果你指定为负数或大于最大活动线程池线程数的数字 (使用获取<xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.GetMaxThreads%2A>)，SetMinThreads 返回`false`并不会更改两个最小值。</xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.GetMaxThreads%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > By default, the minimum number of threads is set to the number of processors on a system.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!CAUTION]&1;> 默认情况下，最小线程数设置为在系统上的处理器数。

trans-unit.source: You can use the SetMinThreads method to increase the minimum number ofthreads.
trans-unit.target: SetMinThreads 方法可用于增加最小的数字 ofthreads。

trans-unit.source: However, unnecessarily increasing these values can cause performance problems.
trans-unit.target: 但是，不必要地增加这些值可能导致性能问题。

trans-unit.source: If too many tasks start at the same time, all of them might appear to be slow.
trans-unit.target: 如果在同一时间开始太多的任务，所有这些可能会很慢。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, the thread pool will perform better with its own algorithm for allocating threads.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下，线程池将使用其自己的分配线程算法更好地执行。

trans-unit.source: Reducing the minimum to less than the number of processors can also hurt performance.
trans-unit.target: 减少到小于处理器数也会影响性能的最小值。

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of worker threads that the thread pool creates on demand.
trans-unit.target: 最小线程池根据需要创建的工作线程数。

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of asynchronous I/O threads that the thread pool creates on demand.
trans-unit.target: 最小线程池根据需要创建的异步 I/O 线程数。

trans-unit.source: Queues an overlapped I/O operation for execution.
trans-unit.target: 执行的队列重叠的 I/O 操作。

trans-unit.source: For information about using native Win32 overlapped I/O, see the <xref:System.Threading.Overlapped> class, the <xref:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped> structure, and the `OVERLAPPED` structure in the Win32 Platform SDK.
trans-unit.target: 有关使用本机 Win32 信息重叠的 I/O，请参阅<xref:System.Threading.Overlapped>类，<xref:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped>结构，与`OVERLAPPED`Win32 平台 SDK 中的结构。</xref:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped> </xref:System.Threading.Overlapped>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Using the UnsafeQueueNativeOverlapped method could inadvertently open up a security hole.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!CAUTION]&1;> 使用 UnsafeQueueNativeOverlapped 方法可能会无意中打开安全漏洞。

trans-unit.source: Code access security bases its permission checks on the permissions of all the callers on the stack.
trans-unit.target: 代码访问安全性将基于堆栈的所有调用方的权限其权限检查。

trans-unit.source: When work is queued on a thread pool thread using UnsafeQueueNativeOverlapped, the stack of the thread pool thread does not have the context of the actual callers.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作的线程池线程使用 UnsafeQueueNativeOverlapped 上排队，则该线程池线程的堆栈没有实际调用方的上下文。

trans-unit.source: Malicious code might be able exploit this to avoid permission checks.
trans-unit.target: 恶意代码可能会利用这一点避开权限检查。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Threading.NativeOverlapped"></xref> structure to queue.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Threading.NativeOverlapped"> </xref>到队列的结构。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the operation was successfully queued to an I/O completion port; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果该操作已成功排队到 I/O 完成端口;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Queues the specified delegate to the thread pool, but does not propagate the calling stack to the worker thread.
trans-unit.target: 指定的委托排队到线程池，但不会传播到辅助线程的调用堆栈。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem%2A> method, UnsafeQueueUserWorkItem does not propagate the calling stack to the worker thread.
trans-unit.target: 与不同<xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem%2A>方法，UnsafeQueueUserWorkItem 不传播到辅助线程的调用堆栈。</xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: This allows code to lose the calling stack and thereby to elevate its security privileges.
trans-unit.target: 这使得代码丢失所做的调用堆栈，从而提升其安全特权。

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Using UnsafeQueueUserWorkItem could inadvertently open up a security hole.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!CAUTION]&1;> 使用 UnsafeQueueUserWorkItem 可能无意中打开安全漏洞。

trans-unit.source: Malicious code might be able exploit this to avoid permission checks.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Threading.WaitCallback"></xref> that represents the delegate to invoke when a thread in the thread pool picks up the work item.

trans-unit.source: The object that is passed to the delegate when serviced from the thread pool.

trans-unit.source: Registers a delegate to wait for a <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>, using a 32-bit signed integer for the time-out in milliseconds.

trans-unit.source: This method does not propagate the calling stack to the worker thread.

trans-unit.source: Unlike the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject%2A> method, UnsafeRegisterWaitForSingleObject does not propagate the calling stack to the worker thread.
trans-unit.target: 与不同<xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject%2A>方法，UnsafeRegisterWaitForSingleObject 不传播到辅助线程的调用堆栈。</xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: This allows code to lose the calling stack and thereby to elevate its security privileges.
trans-unit.target: 这使得代码丢失所做的调用堆栈，从而提升其安全特权。

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Using UnsafeRegisterWaitForSingleObject could inadvertently open up a security hole.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!CAUTION]&1;> 使用 UnsafeRegisterWaitForSingleObject 可能无意中打开安全漏洞。

trans-unit.source: Code access security bases its permission checks on the permissions of all the callers on the stack.
trans-unit.target: 代码访问安全性将基于堆栈的所有调用方的权限其权限检查。

trans-unit.source: When work is queued on a thread pool thread using UnsafeRegisterWaitForSingleObject, the stack of the thread pool thread will not have the context of the actual callers.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作的线程池线程使用 UnsafeRegisterWaitForSingleObject 上排队，线程池线程的堆栈不会实际调用方的上下文。

trans-unit.source: Malicious code might be able exploit this to avoid permission checks.
trans-unit.target: 恶意代码可能会利用这一点避开权限检查。

trans-unit.source: Using a <xref:System.Threading.Mutex> for `waitObject` does not provide mutual exclusion for the callbacks because the underlying Win32 API uses the default `WT_EXECUTEDEFAULT` flag, so each callback is dispatched on a separate thread pool thread.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Threading.Mutex>为`waitObject`不提供的回调的互相排斥，因为基础的 Win32 API 使用默认值`WT_EXECUTEDEFAULT`标志，以便在一个单独的线程池线程上调度每个回调。</xref:System.Threading.Mutex>

trans-unit.source: When you are finished using the <xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle> that is returned by this method, call its <xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to release references to the wait handle.
trans-unit.target: 完成之后使用<xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle>此方法返回时，请调用其<xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法来释放对等待句柄的引用。</xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle>

trans-unit.source: We recommend that you always call the <xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, even if you specify `true` for `executeOnlyOnce`.
trans-unit.target: 我们建议你始终调用<xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法，即使你指定`true`为`executeOnlyOnce`。</xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Garbage collection works more efficiently if you call the <xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method instead of depending on the registered wait handle's finalizer.
trans-unit.target: 垃圾回收的工作的详细信息有效地如果调用<xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法而不是具体取决于已注册的等待句柄的终结器。</xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle> to register.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>注册。</xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>

trans-unit.source: Use a <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle> other than <xref:System.Threading.Mutex>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>以外<xref:System.Threading.Mutex>.</xref:System.Threading.Mutex> </xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>

trans-unit.source: The delegate to call when the `waitObject` parameter is signaled.

trans-unit.source: The object that is passed to the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 传递给委托的对象。

trans-unit.source: The time-out in milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 以毫秒为单位的超时。

trans-unit.source: If the `millisecondsTimeOutInterval` parameter is 0 (zero), the function tests the object's state and returns immediately.
trans-unit.target: 如果`millisecondsTimeOutInterval`参数为 0 （零），函数将测试对象的状态并立即返回。

trans-unit.source: If `millisecondsTimeOutInterval` is -1, the function's time-out interval never elapses.
trans-unit.target: 如果`millisecondsTimeOutInterval`为-1，函数的超时间隔永远不过期。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the thread will no longer wait on the `waitObject` parameter after the delegate has been called; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to indicate that the timer is reset every time the wait operation completes until the wait is unregistered.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要指示该线程将不再等待`waitObject`参数后已调用的委托;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>以指示每次等待操作完成取消注册在等待之前都重置计时器。

trans-unit.source: If `timeout` is -1, the function's time-out interval never elapses.
trans-unit.target: 如果`timeout`为-1，函数的超时间隔永远不过期。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the thread will no longer wait on the `waitObject` parameter after the delegate has been called; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to indicate that the timer is reset every time the wait operation completes until the wait is unregistered.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要指示该线程将不再等待`waitObject`参数后已调用的委托;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>以指示每次等待操作完成取消注册在等待之前都重置计时器。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle"></xref> object that can be used to cancel the registered wait operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle"> </xref>可以用于取消已注册的等待操作的对象。

trans-unit.source: The timeout parameter is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: timeout 参数是小于-1。

trans-unit.source: The timeout parameter is greater than <xref:System.Int32.MaxValue?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: timeout 参数大于<xref:System.Int32.MaxValue?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 调用方没有所要求的权限。

trans-unit.source: Registers a delegate to wait for a <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>, specifying a 32-bit unsigned integer for the time-out in milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 注册委托以等待<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>，以毫秒为单位指定超时的 32 位无符号的整数。</xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>

trans-unit.source: This method does not propagate the calling stack to the worker thread.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不传播到辅助线程的调用堆栈。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject%2A> method, UnsafeRegisterWaitForSingleObject does not propagate the calling stack to the worker thread.
trans-unit.target: 与不同<xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject%2A>方法，UnsafeRegisterWaitForSingleObject 不传播到辅助线程的调用堆栈。</xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: This allows code to lose the calling stack and thereby to elevate its security privileges.
trans-unit.target: 这使得代码丢失所做的调用堆栈，从而提升其安全特权。

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Using UnsafeRegisterWaitForSingleObject could inadvertently open up a security hole.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!CAUTION]&1;> 使用 UnsafeRegisterWaitForSingleObject 可能无意中打开安全漏洞。

trans-unit.source: Code access security bases its permission checks on the permissions of all the callers on the stack.
trans-unit.target: 代码访问安全性将基于堆栈的所有调用方的权限其权限检查。

trans-unit.source: When work is queued on a thread pool thread using UnsafeRegisterWaitForSingleObject, the stack of the thread pool thread will not have the context of the actual callers.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作的线程池线程使用 UnsafeRegisterWaitForSingleObject 上排队，线程池线程的堆栈不会实际调用方的上下文。

trans-unit.source: Malicious code might be able exploit this to avoid permission checks.
trans-unit.target: 恶意代码可能会利用这一点避开权限检查。

trans-unit.source: Using a <xref:System.Threading.Mutex> for `waitObject` does not provide mutual exclusion for the callbacks because the underlying Win32 API uses the default `WT_EXECUTEDEFAULT` flag, so each callback is dispatched on a separate thread pool thread.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Threading.Mutex>为`waitObject`不提供的回调的互相排斥，因为基础的 Win32 API 使用默认值`WT_EXECUTEDEFAULT`标志，以便在一个单独的线程池线程上调度每个回调。</xref:System.Threading.Mutex>

trans-unit.source: When you are finished using the <xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle> that is returned by this method, call its <xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to release references to the wait handle.
trans-unit.target: 完成之后使用<xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle>此方法返回时，请调用其<xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法来释放对等待句柄的引用。</xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle>

trans-unit.source: We recommend that you always call the <xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, even if you specify `true` for `executeOnlyOnce`.
trans-unit.target: 我们建议你始终调用<xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法，即使你指定`true`为`executeOnlyOnce`。</xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Garbage collection works more efficiently if you call the <xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method instead of depending on the registered wait handle's finalizer.
trans-unit.target: 垃圾回收的工作的详细信息有效地如果调用<xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法而不是具体取决于已注册的等待句柄的终结器。</xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle> to register.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>注册。</xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>

trans-unit.source: Use a <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle> other than <xref:System.Threading.Mutex>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>以外<xref:System.Threading.Mutex>.</xref:System.Threading.Mutex> </xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>

trans-unit.source: The delegate to call when the `waitObject` parameter is signaled.
trans-unit.target: 要时调用的委托`waitObject`参数发出信号。

trans-unit.source: The object that is passed to the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 传递给委托的对象。

trans-unit.source: The time-out in milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 以毫秒为单位的超时。

trans-unit.source: If the `millisecondsTimeOutInterval` parameter is 0 (zero), the function tests the object's state and returns immediately.
trans-unit.target: 如果`millisecondsTimeOutInterval`参数为 0 （零），函数将测试对象的状态并立即返回。

trans-unit.source: If `millisecondsTimeOutInterval` is -1, the function's time-out interval never elapses.
trans-unit.target: 如果`millisecondsTimeOutInterval`为-1，函数的超时间隔永远不过期。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the thread will no longer wait on the `waitObject` parameter after the delegate has been called; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to indicate that the timer is reset every time the wait operation completes until the wait is unregistered.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要指示该线程将不再等待`waitObject`参数后已调用的委托;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>以指示每次等待操作完成取消注册在等待之前都重置计时器。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle"></xref> object that can be used to cancel the registered wait operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle"> </xref>可以用于取消已注册的等待操作的对象。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 调用方没有所要求的权限。
